ClearRx

Voice Assistant

"ClearRx, how do I take my blood pressure medication?"

Take one tablet of Lisinopril 10mg by mouth once daily in the morning. Do not skip doses and avoid potassium supplements.

[Image of elderly person using smartphone with voice interface and medication bottles in background]

Features

Voice-First Medication Management

Manage your medications hands-free with intuitive voice commands designed for independence and ease of use.

Scan & Listen

Simply scan your prescription bottle and listen to medication instructions read aloud clearly.

Voice Commands

Say 'ClearRx, how do I take my blood pressure medication?' and get instant, clear answers.

AI-Powered Q&A

Ask questions about your medications and get personalized, easy-to-understand responses.

Medication Reminders

Set voice-activated alarms and reminders to never miss a dose again.

[Image of elderly person using smartphone to scan prescription bottle with voice interface visible]

Designed for Accessibility

Built specifically for individuals with visual impairments and seniors, ensuring everyone can manage their health independently.

ADA & WCAG Compliant

Fully accessible design meeting all accessibility standards for visual impairments.

Large Text & High Contrast

Optional visual elements with clear, readable text for those who prefer or need visual assistance.

Audio-First Experience

Every function works through voice commands, but visual options remain available when needed.

[Image of diverse group including visually impaired person and elderly users testing accessibility features]

Secure & HIPAA Compliant

Your health information is protected with enterprise-grade security and full HIPAA compliance for peace of mind.

Two-Factor Authentication

Voice-activated secure login process protects your sensitive medical information.

Healthcare Integration

Connect with pharmacies and healthcare providers for seamless prescription management.

FDA Database Integration

Access to comprehensive, up-to-date medication information from official FDA sources.

[Image of medical professional consulting with patient using secure tablet interface]

How ClearRx Works

Simple, voice-activated steps to manage your medications independently

1

Scan Your Prescription

Use your phone camera to scan prescription bottles or barcodes. ClearRx automatically recognizes your medication.

[Image of hands holding smartphone scanning prescription bottle barcode]

2

Ask Questions

Say "ClearRx, how do I take my blood pressure medication?" and get clear, spoken instructions.

[Image of person speaking to phone with voice wave visualization]

3

Stay On Track

Set voice-activated reminders and receive medication alerts to never miss a dose.

[Image of elderly person receiving medication reminder notification]

Built for Everyone

Designed with accessibility at its core, ClearRx ensures everyone can manage their health independently.

ADA & WCAG Compliant

Meets all accessibility standards for visual impairments

Voice-First Design

Every feature accessible through voice commands

HIPAA Compliant

Enterprise-grade security protecting your health information
